entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 23. POP 70%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 70 percent chance of light snow changing to 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Thursday 05 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon then 30 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 28 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Thursday 05 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 22. POP 30%
